title: Indus Form
name: Morphrost - Indus Form
printed_effect:
When you Cast this Morphrost you can Expend
{frost} in order to Search your deck for up to 2
Morphrost and send them to your Underworld.
When this Morphrost is destroyed in battle you
can target and destroy a face-down Rune.
effect: When you Normal Cast this Morphrost you can Expend {frost} in order to Search your deck for up to 2 Morphrost and send them to your Underworld. When this Morphrost is destroyed in battle you can target and destroy a face-down Rune.
